trans-unit.source: Defines the metadata attribute of a Web content accessibility rule.
trans-unit.target: 定義無障礙網頁開發規則的中繼資料屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> class defines a Web content accessibility rule that can be verified.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>類別會定義可驗證的 Web 內容的存取範圍規則。

trans-unit.source: For more information on Web Content Accessibility Guidelines, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web 內容的可及性方針的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。

trans-unit.source: The minimal amount of information required to define an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> includes:
trans-unit.target: 定義的執行個體所需的資訊最短<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>包括：

trans-unit.source: A guideline that the verification rule represents.
trans-unit.target: 驗證規則表示指導方針。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Guideline%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Guideline%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A checkpoint of the guideline.
trans-unit.target: 方針的檢查點。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A checkpoint priority.
trans-unit.target: 檢查點的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Priority%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Priority%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel> enumeration value that represents the reporting level that should be rule belongs to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel>所屬列舉值，表示應該是規則的報告層級。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationReportLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationReportLevel%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A message that is reported when the verification rule is true.
trans-unit.target: 驗證規則為 true 時，會報告訊息。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Message%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Optional properties of the verification rule that can be specified when creating an instance:
trans-unit.target: 您可以在建立執行個體時指定之驗證規則的選擇性屬性：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule> enumeration value that represents how the verification rule should be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule>列舉值，表示如何解譯驗證規則。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationRule%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationRule%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator> enumeration value that represents the operator in the conditional expression used to test the verification rule.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator>列舉值，表示用來測試驗證規則的條件式運算式中的運算子。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationConditionalOperator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationConditionalOperator%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: An accessibility reference guideline URL.
trans-unit.target: 協助工具參考指導方針的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A conditional value representing the right side of a conditional expression.
trans-unit.target: 條件式值，表示在條件運算式的右邊。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A conditional property representing the left side of a conditional expression.
trans-unit.target: 條件屬性，表示在條件運算式的左邊。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the constructor sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式集合中指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> metadata can be defined class, property, and indexer declarations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>中繼資料可以是類別、 屬性和索引子的定義的宣告。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: In the verification metadata definition, the guidelines used are "WCAG," the Web Content Accessibility Guideline, and "ADA," Americans with Disabilities Act Guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 在驗證中繼資料定義中，使用的指導方針是"WCAG，「 Web 內容可存取性指導方針和 「 ADA"美國殘障人士等更 Act 指導方針。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。

trans-unit.source: The checkpoints used are "1.1" and "1194.22(a)" for WCAG and ADA, respectively, checkpoints for ensuring that a text equivalent exists for non-text elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用檢查點可為"1.1"和"1194.22(a)"WCAG 和 ADA 分別以確保非文字項目是否有文字對等的檢查點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> is applied to the `ImageText` property that represents the text equivalent of another property called `ImageProperty`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>套用至`ImageText`表示另一個屬性的文字對等用法屬性呼叫`ImageProperty`。

trans-unit.source: If the `ImageText` property is not set, the accessibility verification will return the message "The image is missing a text equivalent."
trans-unit.target: 如果`ImageText`屬性未設定，網頁可及性驗證將會傳回訊息 「 映像缺少文字對等用法。 」

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The accessibility guideline the verification rule describes.
trans-unit.target: 驗證規則所描述的可及性方針。

trans-unit.source: The checkpoint within the guideline.
trans-unit.target: 指導原則之內的檢查點。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The priority of the checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 檢查點的優先權。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed when the verification rule is true.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證規則為 true 時，即顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute" /> class with accessibility guideline, checkpoint, reporting level, checkpoint priority, and error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用協助工具方針、檢查點、報告層級、檢查點優先權，以及錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor of the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> class specifies the minimal amount of information needed to define a verification rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式的<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>類別會指定最低限度的定義的驗證規則所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following default values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance are assumed:
trans-unit.target: 下列的預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>會假設執行個體：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationRule%2A> property is set as <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule.Required>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationRule%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule.Required>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationConditionalOperator%2A> property is set as <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator.Equals>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationConditionalOperator%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator.Equals>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A> property is set as an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A>屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A> property is set as an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A>屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A> property is set as an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor overloads.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定屬性的值超出其預設值前述清單中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式多載。

trans-unit.source: The accessibility guideline the verification rule describes.
trans-unit.target: 驗證規則所描述的可及性方針。

trans-unit.source: The checkpoint within the guideline.
trans-unit.target: 指導原則之內的檢查點。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The priority of the checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 檢查點的優先權。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed when the verification rule is true.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證規則為 true 時，即顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" />.values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The left side of a conditional expression used to verify the accessibility rule.
trans-unit.target: 條件運算式的左邊，用於驗證協助工具規則。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute" /> class with accessibility guideline, checkpoint, reporting level, checkpoint priority, error message, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" />.value, and related conditional property.
trans-unit.target: 使用協助工具方針、檢查點、報告層級、檢查點優先權、錯誤訊息、<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute" />.value，以及相關條件屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `conditionalProperty` parameter is another property that is used as part of the conditional expression to evaluate the verification rule.
trans-unit.target: `conditionalProperty`參數是用來評估的驗證規則的條件運算式的一部分的另一個屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the rule parameter is <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule.NotEmptyString> then the related property specified by `conditionalProperty` must not be an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果規則參數<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule.NotEmptyString>然後相關的屬性所指定`conditionalProperty`不能為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The following default values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance are assumed:
trans-unit.target: 下列的預設值<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>會假設執行個體：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationConditionalOperator%2A> property is set as <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator.Equals>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationConditionalOperator%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator.Equals>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A> property is set as an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A>屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A> property is set as an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>屬性已設定為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定屬性的值超出其預設值前述清單中，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A>建構函式多載。

trans-unit.source: The accessibility guideline the verification rule describes.
trans-unit.target: 驗證規則所描述的可及性方針。

trans-unit.source: The checkpoint within the guideline.
trans-unit.target: 指導原則之內的檢查點。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The priority of the checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 檢查點的優先權。

trans-unit.source: The message displayed when the verification rule is true.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證規則為 true 時，即顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" />.values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The left side of a conditional expression used to verify the accessibility rule.
trans-unit.target: 條件運算式的左邊，用於驗證協助工具規則。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The right hand side of a conditional expression used to verify the accessibility rule.
trans-unit.target: 條件運算式的右邊，用於驗證協助工具規則。

trans-unit.source: A reference URL for <c>guideline</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>guideline</c> 的參考 URL。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute" /> class with accessibility guideline, checkpoint, reporting level, checkpoint priority, error message, <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" />.value, related conditional property, a related conditional property value, and a reference guideline URL.
trans-unit.target: 使用協助工具方針、檢查點、報告層級、檢查點優先權、錯誤訊息、<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute" />.value、相關條件屬性、相關條件屬性值，以及參考方針 URL，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A> allows you to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> class with all the possible properties specified.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.%23ctor%2A>可讓您建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>使用指定的所有可能屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the accessibility checkpoint reference in the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Guideline" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Guideline" /> 屬性中的協助工具檢查點參考。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the checkpoint reference.
trans-unit.target: 表示檢查點參考的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A> property is set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created and is required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A>時設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立，而且需要。

trans-unit.source: For the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines defined on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A> property is specified as a guideline number followed by a period (.) followed by a checkpoint number.
trans-unit.target: 上定義 Web 內容可及性方針[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A>屬性會指定為指導方針的數字，後面接著句號 （.） 後面接著檢查點的數字。

trans-unit.source: Gets the left side of a conditional expression used as part of the verification accessibility checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得條件運算式的左邊，用做驗證協助工具檢查點的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The left side of the conditional expression.
trans-unit.target: 條件運算式的左邊。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A> property can be set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created, but is optional.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>屬性時可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立時，但是為選擇性。

trans-unit.source: If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalProperty` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用建構函式不接受`conditionalProperty`參數，預設值是空字串 ("") 會使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A> property is the right side, or value, of a conditional expression that is use in the verification of the accessibility checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A>屬性是右邊或正在使用中的協助工具檢查點驗證的條件運算式的值。

trans-unit.source: The left side of the conditional expression is specified with the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的條件運算式的左半部<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the right side of a conditional expression used as part of the verification accessibility checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得條件運算式的右邊，用做驗證協助工具檢查點的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The right side of a conditional expression.
trans-unit.target: 條件運算式的右邊。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A> property can be set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created, but is optional.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A>屬性時可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立時，但是為選擇性。

trans-unit.source: If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalValue` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用建構函式不接受`conditionalValue`參數，預設值是空字串 ("") 會使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A> property is the right side, or value, of a conditional expression that is use in the verification of the accessibility checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalValue%2A>屬性是右邊或正在使用中的協助工具檢查點驗證的條件運算式的值。

trans-unit.source: The left side of the conditional expression is specified with the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的條件運算式的左半部<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.ConditionalProperty%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the guideline that used for accessibility checking.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於檢查協助工具的方針。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the guideline.
trans-unit.target: 表示方針的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Guideline%2A> property is set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created and is required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Guideline%2A>時設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立，而且需要。

trans-unit.source: Examples of guidelines include "WCAG 1.1" and "ADA508".
trans-unit.target: 指導方針的範例包括"WCAG 1.1 」 和 「 ADA508"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL the can be used to get more information on the accessibility guidelines given in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Guideline" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得 URL，可以用來取得 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Guideline" /> 屬性中指定之協助工具方針的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A> property can be set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created, but is optional.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A>屬性時可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立時，但是為選擇性。

trans-unit.source: If you use a constructor that does not take a `guidelineUrl` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用建構函式不接受`guidelineUrl`參數，預設值是空字串 ("") 會使用。

trans-unit.source: The string entered for the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A> property is not checked for correctness.
trans-unit.target: 輸入字串<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.GuidelineUrl%2A>屬性不會檢查是否正確。

trans-unit.source: Gets a message string when the accessibility checkpoint verification rule is true.
trans-unit.target: 當協助工具檢查點驗證規則為 true 時取得訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: An error string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Message%2A> property is set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created and is required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Message%2A>時設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立，而且需要。

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority of the accessibility checkpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得協助工具檢查點的優先權。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the priority.
trans-unit.target: 表示優先權的整數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Priority%2A> property defines the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A> property's impact on accessibility.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Priority%2A>屬性會定義<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A>協助工具屬性的影響。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Priority%2A> property are set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created and is required.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Checkpoint%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.Priority%2A>屬性時，會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立，而且需要。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator" /> enumeration value indication how the accessibility checkpoint is verified.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator" /> 列舉值，表示協助工具檢查點的驗證方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator.Equals" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator.Equals" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationConditionalOperator%2A> property can be set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created, but is optional.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationConditionalOperator%2A>屬性時可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立時，但是為選擇性。

trans-unit.source: If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalOperator` parameter, the default value of <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator.Equals> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用建構函式不接受`conditionalOperator`參數，預設值的<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationConditionalOperator.Equals>用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> enumeration value indicating how the accessibility checkpoint is used.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> 列舉值，表示協助工具檢查點的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationReportLevel" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationReportLevel%2A> property is set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created and is required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationReportLevel%2A>時設定屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立，而且需要。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" /> enumeration value indicating how the accessibility checkpoint is used.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" /> 列舉值，表示協助工具檢查點的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule.Required" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule.Required" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationRule%2A> property can be set when the <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute> instance is created, but is optional.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute.VerificationRule%2A>屬性時可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute>執行個體建立時，但是為選擇性。

trans-unit.source: If you use a constructor that does not take a `rule` parameter, the default value of <xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule.Required> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用建構函式不接受`rule`參數，預設值的<xref:System.Web.UI.VerificationRule.Required>用。
